XIII.i.1.B.2.f
.
Eligibility Based on Death in Service
Concede that death in service is SC unless a rating is required under
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, 1.C.1.b
.  Cases in which service connection may be conceded include those in which
death resulted from disease, armed conflict, or common accident during service, or
the service member is missing or missing in action and death has been presumed by the service department.
